name: Validate credit card expiry date
description:
It is a simple, real world task.
You will receive a single string as input. It will have the month (2 digits) and year(2 or 4 digits). These are separated by one character ("-" or "/", maybe some spaces too). For example:
*  02/21
*  02 / 21
*  02 / 2021
*  02-2021

Assume that all dates are in the XXI century.

Your task is to write a function that returns true or false if the expiry date is not in the past. Note, current month should still return true.

Good luck.
